description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Be very, very quiet… we’re wrangling Zombies!! Save the city of Potters Field from an infestation of zany zombies in the quirky and comical Zombie Wranglers! Armed with a souped up Wrangler-Pack and your own unique special abilities, play as one of the four gallant apprentice Wranglers and rescue your neighborhood before it’s too late. Unlock the full game now! This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Save the city of Potters Field from an infestation of zany zombies in the quirky and comical Zombie Wranglers! Armed with a trustworthy Wrangler-Pack and your own unique special abilities, play as one of the four gallant apprentice Wranglers and rescue the neighborhood before it’s too late! Play as either Uju, Amy, Dean, or Monica and defeat the hordes of skater zombies, soccer mom Zombies and many more.
